following.name: The Killing (2011)
following.description:
From writer, executive producer and series showrunner Veena Sud (Cold Case), The Killing is based on the wildly successful Danish television series Forbrydelsen and tells the story of the murder of a young girl in Seattle and the subsequent police investigation.

The Killing ties together three distinct stories around a single murder including the detectives assigned to the case, the victim's grieving family, and the suspects. Set in Seattle, the story also explores local politics as it follows politicians connected to the case. As the series unfolds, it becomes clear that there are no accidents; everyone has a secret, and while the characters think they've moved on, their past isn't done with them.

guide3.name: Wrong Side of the Road (1)
guide3.description: Holmes' former protÃ©gÃ©, Kitty Winter, returns to New York after a three-year absence to warn him that a killer is eliminating everybody involved with a case they worked on together in London.  Watson discovers that Kitty has a life-changing secret.

guide3.name: Imminent Risk
guide3.description: Carrie gets bad news. Saul makes a plan. Quinn accepts his situation.

guide3.name: Tougher Than the Rest
guide3.description: With Snow still asleep in Storybrooke, David and Hook race to stop Gideon before he can confront Emma. Gideon makes a startling confession to Belle and Gold about his whereabouts while he was missing. Meanwhile, Regina struggles with the realization that everyone, perhaps even Robin, is better off in the alternate world where the Evil Queen was defeated. And when Emma inspires a familiar face to help her and Regina return home, she discovers the power to change her fate.

guide3.name: Say Yes
guide3.description: The group scavenges for supplies. Back in Alexandria, someone must make a morally challenging decision.

guide3.name: The Dating Game
guide3.description: Quagmire discovers the "dating" app Tinder, forcing Peter, Joe and Cleveland to intervene and save him from his soul-sucking hedonism. Meanwhile, Stewie finds out that he has scoliosis and learns the perks of his latest diagnosis.

guide3.name: Kamp Krustier
guide3.description: When Bart and Lisa return home abruptly after a traumatic incident at Kamp Krustier, they put an end to Homer and Marge's romantic encounters. Without sex to distract him, Homer becomes a more productive worker and caring husband, but Marge misses the old Homer. Then, Bart and Lisa return to camp to confront the source of their trauma.

guide3.name: Exodus
guide3.description: As Alex searches for Jeremiah and Kara investigates a series of alien kidnappings, the sisters realize they must break the rules to foil a new Cadmus plot. In an effort to get Snapper Carr to run a story that would help her stop Cadmus, Kara agrees to set up an interview between Snapper and Supergirl.

guide3.name: Land of the Lost
guide3.description: After capturing Rip, he forces the Waverider to crash, leaving the Legends stuck 70 million years in the past. Ray leads Amaya and Nate to recover a vital piece of the ship. In an effort to get the â€œgoodâ€ Rip back, Rory suggests they enter Ripâ€™s mind, but what Sara and Jax discover in his subconscious is not pleasant and they must fight evil versions of themselves. Meanwhile, Nate and Amaya continue to get closer, but it could cause serious ramifications.

guide3.name: The Wrath of Savitar
guide3.description: While training with Barry, Wally starts to have visions of Savitar, which he hides from the team. A dangerous secret threatens Barry and Irisâ€™ happiness.

guide3.name: Amber Waves
guide3.description: The fifth and penultimate  season has the Jennings struggling to contain the risks from Paige's growing relationship with Matthew Beeman.  The Centre sends Philip and Elizabeth on an operation unlike any they've ever had before, straining their family and marriage to its limits.

guide3.name: Doggie Howser
guide3.description: While Erica receives her college acceptance letters, Barry decides to become a doctor and looks at schools with good medical programs; Lainey announces that she is going to a school without a medical program, making Barry rethink his idea.

guide3.name: Bianca Toro
guide3.description: The guys try to get rid of a motivational speaker when she begins interfering with a beloved office awards show.

guide3.name: Basketball
guide3.description: After choking at last yearâ€™s charity basketball game, Phil has been training all year to redeem himself. However, when NBA stars Charles Barkley and DeAndre Jordan attend the game and start making bets, Phil tries to not buckle under the pressure. Meanwhile, Gloria has to step-up at Mannyâ€™s school when her nemesis, Donna Duncan, tries to shame her for her lack of support at the school. Finally, Claire does whatever it takes to keep a work mistake secret from Jay, while Jayâ€™s concerned that Joe doesnâ€™t have a healthy fear of him at all.

guide3.name: Dennis' Double Life
guide3.description: Dennis reveals he has a baby after his Wade Boggs layover in North Dakota and the gang try to help him get out of the jam, but their suggestions border on the extreme.

guide3.name: The Escape Hatch Identification
guide3.description: Raj searches for a cheaper living arrangement.

guide3.name: Somewhere Between Heaven and Hell
guide3.description: An attack by an invisible hellhound at a campsite leads Sam and Dean to investigate the mysterious circumstances. Meanwhile, two of Crowleyâ€™s own personal demons uncover what he has been hiding. Castiel gets a lead on Kelly Kline.

guide3.name: Civil War
guide3.description: Richard, Jackson, April and Catherine tackle a tough trauma case intensified by hospital politics; Amelia finally faces her feelings about Owen; Meredith gets caught between Nathan and Alex over a patient.

guide3.name: Insatiable
guide3.description: When one of Diana's mentors is targeted by a horrific monster, she decides that the team must channel all of their power toward stopping Dreyfuss. Meanwhile, Dreyfuss and Jobe have a breakthrough on a project of which Team Witness may not yet be aware.

guide3.name: Blood Magic
guide3.description: After a series of brutal and deadly attacks, Nick and Hank find an unlikely lead in a local nursing home. Meanwhile, Eve goes to Adalind to get answers that only a Hexenbiest can provide. Elsewhere, Capt. Renard confronts Nick about the mysterious symbols and tries to strike a deal.

guide3.name: Puka 'ana
guide3.description: (Exodus) McGarrett and Kono suspect that an abused young girl may be the victim of a sex trafficking ring on the Island. Also, Chin and Grover investigate a murder at a sober living facility.

guide3.name: I Was Feeling Epic
guide3.description: With the fate of Mystic Falls at stake, Stefan and Damon must fight their greatest enemy for one last battle. Series Finale.

guide7.name: I Was Feeling Epic
guide7.description: With the fate of Mystic Falls at stake, Stefan and Damon must fight their greatest enemy for one last battle. Series Finale.

guide7.name: Fidelity (2)
guide7.description: In the conclusion, Joan and Kitty try to prove that a string of murders, stemming from an old case Sherlock and Kitty solved in London, is connected to an international government conspiracy with the Defense Intelligence Agency at its center. Also, Sherlock and Kittyâ€™s relationship is strained after she shares life-changing news.

guide7.name: Alt.Truth
guide7.description: Carrie and Saul present evidence to Keane. Quinn tracks a mark.

guide7.name: Murder Most Foul
guide7.description: Before Hook takes the next step in his relationship with Emma, he wants to make sure David sees him as more than just a pirate. So when David asks Hook to help him uncover the truth about his fatherâ€™s death, Hook agrees. Meanwhile, Regina works to acclimate Robin to life in Storybrooke, but soon discovers he has a dark side that makes the task much more complicated than she anticipated.

guide7.name: Bury Me Here
guide7.description: Things do not go as planned when a group of Kingdommers delivers goods to the Saviors during a routine supply drop-off.

guide7.name: Cop and a Half-wit
guide7.description: Peter helps Joe out with several crime cases, but when Joe tries to take all the credit, Peter gets extremely angry. Meanwhile, Brian convinces Stewie to join a football team and panics when he gets a concussion.

guide7.name: 22 for 30
guide7.description: In this parody of a cable sports show, Bart goes from delinquent with detention to the star basketball player at Springfield Elementary. Lisa covers Bart's success for the school paper, and Homer becomes the teamâ€™s coach. Things go awry when Bart gets involved with the mafia.

guide7.name: Moonshot
guide7.description: When the Legends track Commander Steel to NASA Headquarters in 1970, they learn where Nateâ€™s grandfather hid the last fragment of the Spear of Destiny.  The team notices a time aberration during the Apollo 13 mission and believes that the Legion of Doom might be involved.  As the Legends journey into space to intercept Apollo 13, the Waverider suffers massive internal damage and Rayâ€™s life is left in jeopardy when he is stranded on the moon.  Meanwhile, tension grows between Rip and Sara as to who is the leader of the team.

guide7.name: Into the Speed Force
guide7.description: Desperate to stop Savitar and save his friends, Barry turns to the speed force for answers. H.R. gives Jesse some advice.

guide7.name: Pests
guide7.description: Stan and Oleg wrestle with the harsh consequences of their complicated history, as Philip and Elizabeth face a new mission with devastating implications for their country.

guide7.name: Socalyalcon VI
guide7.description: When Reagan returns home from a work trip, Jess is concerned that she has been spending too much time being Nick's "girlfriend." Meanwhile, Schmidt and Cece obsess over security in their new home and Aly reveals an embarrassing secret to Winston.

guide7.name: We Will Rise
guide7.description: Clarke and Roan must work together in hostile territory in order to deliver an invaluable asset to Abby and her team.

guide7.name: Deadheads
guide7.description: Barry feels threatened when school deadhead Matt starts hanging out with the JTP and soon finds himself kicked out of the group when he becomes too controlling.

guide7.name: Checkmate
guide7.description: Oliver gets closer to the truth about Prometheus. Meanwhile, Helix refuses to continue helping Felicity until she does a favor for them.

guide7.name: Party Gawds
guide7.description: In the series finale, the guys become party gods after an energy drink company starts paying them to throw ragers.

guide7.name: Pig Moon Rising
guide7.description: The culturally diverse members of an expanded family spend their days attempting to keep order in their corner of California, as complications, both personal and professional, provide them with plenty of lessons that will allow them to grow.

guide14.description: Before Hook takes the next step in his relationship with Emma, he wants to make sure David sees him as more than just a pirate. So when David asks Hook to help him uncover the truth about his fatherâ€™s death, Hook agrees. Meanwhile, Regina works to acclimate Robin to life in Storybrooke, but soon discovers he has a dark side that makes the task much more complicated than she anticipated.

guide14.name: Bury Me Here
guide14.description: Things do not go as planned when a group of Kingdommers delivers goods to the Saviors during a routine supply drop-off.

guide14.name: Cop and a Half-wit
guide14.description: Peter helps Joe out with several crime cases, but when Joe tries to take all the credit, Peter gets extremely angry. Meanwhile, Brian convinces Stewie to join a football team and panics when he gets a concussion.

guide14.name: 22 for 30
guide14.description: In this parody of a cable sports show, Bart goes from delinquent with detention to the star basketball player at Springfield Elementary. Lisa covers Bart's success for the school paper, and Homer becomes the teamâ€™s coach. Things go awry when Bart gets involved with the mafia.

guide14.name: Moonshot
guide14.description: When the Legends track Commander Steel to NASA Headquarters in 1970, they learn where Nateâ€™s grandfather hid the last fragment of the Spear of Destiny.  The team notices a time aberration during the Apollo 13 mission and believes that the Legion of Doom might be involved.  As the Legends journey into space to intercept Apollo 13, the Waverider suffers massive internal damage and Rayâ€™s life is left in jeopardy when he is stranded on the moon.  Meanwhile, tension grows between Rip and Sara as to who is the leader of the team.

guide14.name: Into the Speed Force
guide14.description: Desperate to stop Savitar and save his friends, Barry turns to the speed force for answers. H.R. gives Jesse some advice.

guide14.name: Pests
guide14.description: Stan and Oleg wrestle with the harsh consequences of their complicated history, as Philip and Elizabeth face a new mission with devastating implications for their country.

guide14.name: Socalyalcon VI
guide14.description: When Reagan returns home from a work trip, Jess is concerned that she has been spending too much time being Nick's "girlfriend." Meanwhile, Schmidt and Cece obsess over security in their new home and Aly reveals an embarrassing secret to Winston.

guide14.name: We Will Rise
guide14.description: Clarke and Roan must work together in hostile territory in order to deliver an invaluable asset to Abby and her team.

guide14.name: Deadheads
guide14.description: Barry feels threatened when school deadhead Matt starts hanging out with the JTP and soon finds himself kicked out of the group when he becomes too controlling.

guide14.name: Checkmate
guide14.description: Oliver gets closer to the truth about Prometheus. Meanwhile, Helix refuses to continue helping Felicity until she does a favor for them.

guide14.name: Party Gawds
guide14.description: In the series finale, the guys become party gods after an energy drink company starts paying them to throw ragers.

guide14.name: Pig Moon Rising
guide14.description: The culturally diverse members of an expanded family spend their days attempting to keep order in their corner of California, as complications, both personal and professional, provide them with plenty of lessons that will allow them to grow.

guide14.name: Who Is He (And What Is He To You)?
guide14.description: Jackson and April travel to Montana in order to perform a complicated surgery on a young patient, but Jacksonâ€™s mind is elsewhere, and April is forced to step up and get him back on track.

guide14.name: The Way of the Gun
guide14.description: When a mysterious woman finds her way into the vault, the team struggles to understand who she is and with whom her allegiances lie. Meanwhile, Alex must come to terms with her complicated feelings when she finds herself in a tight spot. Can Team Witness handle what might be revealed?

guide14.name: Where the Wild Things Were
guide14.description: Eve goes on a mission to take on the mysterious force she saw in the mirror and finds herself in unfamiliar territory. When the gang discovers what she has done, Nick finds a way to join her. Meanwhile, an uneasy alliance is established when Capt. Renard is brought in to help and discovers this all may be connected to the person he cares for the most, Diana.

guide14.name: The Ballad of Lady Frances
guide14.description: The police call in Holmes and Watson to consult on a homicide "heard" by a cutting edge gunshot detection system when they can't find any tangible evidence that a crime was committed. Also, Sherlock and Joan become suspicious of Shinwell when he's the target of a drive-by shooting that reveals a connection between him and an unsolved murder.

guide14.name: Sock Puppets
guide14.description: Carrie catches a break. Keane makes a plan. Max goes undercover.

guide14.name: Strong Threats
guide14.description: The Saviors visit the Hilltop unexpectedly, surprising everyone, with plans of taking more than supplies.

guide14.name: Saturated Fat Guy
guide14.description: In an attempt to avoid eating the healthy food that Lois forces him to eat, Peter opens up his own food truck with fattening foods. Meanwhile, Meg joins a roller derby team, despite Chris thinking itâ€™s too dangerous.

guide14.name: A Father's Watch
guide14.description: Worried that Bart is destined for failure, Marge turns to a series of parenting "experts" for advice. Homer decides to cash in on one expertâ€™s advice by opening up a trophy store in Springfield. Meanwhile, Bart finds some needed encouragement from Grampa, who gives him a precious watch coveted by Homer.

guide14.name: Star-Crossed (1)
guide14.description: A new villain comes to National City, putting Supergirl on high alert. Meanwhile, Winn's girlfriend, Lyra, gets Winn in trouble with the law. Maggie attempts to help Winn but old loyalties get in the way. The Music Meister attacks Supergirl.

guide14.name: Fellowship of the Spear
guide14.description: The Legends must devise a plan to retrieve the last remaining fragments of the Spear of Destiny from the Legion of Doom.  They find themselves in France at the height of World War I faced with the knowledge that they must destroy the mystical object.  They enlist the help of a soldier by the name of John Ronald Reuel Tolkin and find that the Spear is leading them into the heart of the war.  Meanwhile, the team must all resist the temptation of the Spear, and the return of a former teammate.

guide14.name: Duet (2)
guide14.description:
Barry and team are surprised when Mon-El and Hank Henshaw arrive on their Earth carrying a comatose Supergirl who was whammied by the Music Meister. Unable to wake her up, they turn to Team Flash to save her. However, the Music Meister surprises The Flash and puts him in a similar coma, one that Team Flash can't cure. Kara and Barry wake up without their powers in an alternate reality where life is like a musical and the only way to escape is by following the script, complete with singing and dancing, to the end. 

This episode began in Supergirl S02E16.

guide14.name: The Midges
guide14.description: Philip and Elizabeth tell Paige more about the family business, but pressing new questions arise when an operation takes a ghastly and unexpected turn. Meanwhile, a sensitive package jeopardizes Olegâ€™s life back home.

guide14.name: Misery
guide14.description: Jess avoids her feelings for Nick by taking care of her dad in Portland. While attending a work party with Reagan, Nick panics that they really don't know each other. Meanwhile, Aly prepares to meet Winston's mom for the first time, as Winston admits he hasn't told her they are cops.

guide14.name: Sound and Fury
guide14.description: After launching a deadly missile at Angelo, Lucious announces his new music project, Inferno, and puts everyone on notice - especially Cookie, who then vows to knock him off his throne for good. The two engage in an epic clash - fueled by a history of love, loyalty and betrayal. Meanwhile, Jamal befriends musician Tory Ash during his stay in rehab, Andre continues with his plan to take over EMPIRE, and Hakeem and Tiana battle Nessa for a spot in the music showcase.

guide14.name: Gimme Shelter
guide14.description: Clarkeâ€™s arrival on the island quickly takes a turn for the worse. Meanwhile, Bellamy tries to avoid further tragedy in Arkadia.

guide14.name: Kapiushon
guide14.description: Prometheus goes to great lengths to break Oliver. Meanwhile, in the flashbacks, Anatoly becomes worried about Oliverâ€™s increasingly violent tendencies, which come to a head in a brutal confrontation.

guide21.name: Wrong Side of the Road (1)
guide21.description: Holmes' former protÃ©gÃ©, Kitty Winter, returns to New York after a three-year absence to warn him that a killer is eliminating everybody involved with a case they worked on together in London.  Watson discovers that Kitty has a life-changing secret.

guide21.name: Imminent Risk
guide21.description: Carrie gets bad news. Saul makes a plan. Quinn accepts his situation.

guide21.name: Tougher Than the Rest
guide21.description: With Snow still asleep in Storybrooke, David and Hook race to stop Gideon before he can confront Emma. Gideon makes a startling confession to Belle and Gold about his whereabouts while he was missing. Meanwhile, Regina struggles with the realization that everyone, perhaps even Robin, is better off in the alternate world where the Evil Queen was defeated. And when Emma inspires a familiar face to help her and Regina return home, she discovers the power to change her fate.

guide21.name: Say Yes
guide21.description: The group scavenges for supplies. Back in Alexandria, someone must make a morally challenging decision.

guide21.name: The Dating Game
guide21.description: Quagmire discovers the "dating" app Tinder, forcing Peter, Joe and Cleveland to intervene and save him from his soul-sucking hedonism. Meanwhile, Stewie finds out that he has scoliosis and learns the perks of his latest diagnosis.

guide21.name: Kamp Krustier
guide21.description: When Bart and Lisa return home abruptly after a traumatic incident at Kamp Krustier, they put an end to Homer and Marge's romantic encounters. Without sex to distract him, Homer becomes a more productive worker and caring husband, but Marge misses the old Homer. Then, Bart and Lisa return to camp to confront the source of their trauma.

guide21.name: Exodus
guide21.description: As Alex searches for Jeremiah and Kara investigates a series of alien kidnappings, the sisters realize they must break the rules to foil a new Cadmus plot. In an effort to get Snapper Carr to run a story that would help her stop Cadmus, Kara agrees to set up an interview between Snapper and Supergirl.

guide21.name: Land of the Lost
guide21.description: After capturing Rip, he forces the Waverider to crash, leaving the Legends stuck 70 million years in the past. Ray leads Amaya and Nate to recover a vital piece of the ship. In an effort to get the â€œgoodâ€ Rip back, Rory suggests they enter Ripâ€™s mind, but what Sara and Jax discover in his subconscious is not pleasant and they must fight evil versions of themselves. Meanwhile, Nate and Amaya continue to get closer, but it could cause serious ramifications.

guide21.name: The Wrath of Savitar
guide21.description: While training with Barry, Wally starts to have visions of Savitar, which he hides from the team. A dangerous secret threatens Barry and Irisâ€™ happiness.

guide21.name: Amber Waves
guide21.description: The fifth and penultimate  season has the Jennings struggling to contain the risks from Paige's growing relationship with Matthew Beeman.  The Centre sends Philip and Elizabeth on an operation unlike any they've ever had before, straining their family and marriage to its limits.

guide21.name: Doggie Howser
guide21.description: While Erica receives her college acceptance letters, Barry decides to become a doctor and looks at schools with good medical programs; Lainey announces that she is going to a school without a medical program, making Barry rethink his idea.

guide21.name: Bianca Toro
guide21.description: The guys try to get rid of a motivational speaker when she begins interfering with a beloved office awards show.

guide21.name: Basketball
guide21.description: After choking at last yearâ€™s charity basketball game, Phil has been training all year to redeem himself. However, when NBA stars Charles Barkley and DeAndre Jordan attend the game and start making bets, Phil tries to not buckle under the pressure. Meanwhile, Gloria has to step-up at Mannyâ€™s school when her nemesis, Donna Duncan, tries to shame her for her lack of support at the school. Finally, Claire does whatever it takes to keep a work mistake secret from Jay, while Jayâ€™s concerned that Joe doesnâ€™t have a healthy fear of him at all.

guide21.name: Dennis' Double Life
guide21.description: Dennis reveals he has a baby after his Wade Boggs layover in North Dakota and the gang try to help him get out of the jam, but their suggestions border on the extreme.

guide21.name: The Escape Hatch Identification
guide21.description: Raj searches for a cheaper living arrangement.

guide21.name: Somewhere Between Heaven and Hell
guide21.description: An attack by an invisible hellhound at a campsite leads Sam and Dean to investigate the mysterious circumstances. Meanwhile, two of Crowleyâ€™s own personal demons uncover what he has been hiding. Castiel gets a lead on Kelly Kline.

guide21.name: Civil War
guide21.description: Richard, Jackson, April and Catherine tackle a tough trauma case intensified by hospital politics; Amelia finally faces her feelings about Owen; Meredith gets caught between Nathan and Alex over a patient.

guide21.name: Insatiable
guide21.description: When one of Diana's mentors is targeted by a horrific monster, she decides that the team must channel all of their power toward stopping Dreyfuss. Meanwhile, Dreyfuss and Jobe have a breakthrough on a project of which Team Witness may not yet be aware.

guide21.name: Blood Magic
guide21.description: After a series of brutal and deadly attacks, Nick and Hank find an unlikely lead in a local nursing home. Meanwhile, Eve goes to Adalind to get answers that only a Hexenbiest can provide. Elsewhere, Capt. Renard confronts Nick about the mysterious symbols and tries to strike a deal.

guide21.name: Puka 'ana
guide21.description: (Exodus) McGarrett and Kono suspect that an abused young girl may be the victim of a sex trafficking ring on the Island. Also, Chin and Grover investigate a murder at a sober living facility.

guide21.name: I Was Feeling Epic
guide21.description: With the fate of Mystic Falls at stake, Stefan and Damon must fight their greatest enemy for one last battle. Series Finale.

guide21.name: Fidelity (2)
guide21.description: In the conclusion, Joan and Kitty try to prove that a string of murders, stemming from an old case Sherlock and Kitty solved in London, is connected to an international government conspiracy with the Defense Intelligence Agency at its center. Also, Sherlock and Kittyâ€™s relationship is strained after she shares life-changing news.

guide21.name: Till I Hear It From You
guide21.description: Diane Pierce returns to Grey Sloan, but Maggie is still in the dark as to why sheâ€™s really there. Owen and Amelia hash out their problems as they work a trauma case together, and Bailey tries to mend her relationship with Richard.

guide21.name: Tomorrow
guide21.description: With a glimpse into the dystopian world that could be if Dreyfuss comes to power, the team learns more about Lara. Knowing what is at stake, can Team Witness put a stop to the billionaire mad man before it's too late?

guide21.name: ZerstÃ¶rer Shrugged
guide21.description: The prophecy that was uncovered comes to pass when a dark force arrives in Portland with its eyes set on Diana. In an effort to protect her, Nick, along with Capt. Renard and Adalind, returns to the scene of his first investigation as a Grimm. Back at the Spice Shop, Monroe, Eve and Rosalee make a discovery that uncovers the origins of the mysterious stick. Meanwhile, Hank and Wu are called to a crime scene that is connected to the gang's greatest threat.

guide21.name: Dead Man's Tale
guide21.description: Sherlock and Joan question how well they know Shinwell when they investigate the possibility he may have gotten away with the unsolved murder of his friend, a fellow gang member. Also, Sherlock and Joanâ€™s latest case puts them on the hunt for a treasure map rumored to lead to a fortune in pirateâ€™s gold hidden around New York City.

guide21.name: And Here We Are
guide21.description: A group of Alexandrians embarks on a journey; one member of the group must make a heartbreaking decision.

guide21.name: Peter's Lost Youth
guide21.description: Peter gets jealous of Lois when she upstages him at a Red Sox fantasy baseball camp. Meanwhile, Stewie runs away from home when Meg is left to babysit.

guide21.name: What's the Matter with Kansas?
guide21.description: Philip and Elizabeth have qualms about a new assignment, while a specter from Philipâ€™s past creates unforeseen dangers. At the FBI, Stan makes a shocking play that could throw his career into turmoil.

breaking_bad.name: Breaking Bad
breaking_bad.description: Walter White, a struggling high school chemistry teacher, is diagnosed with advanced lung cancer. He turns to a life of crime, producing and selling methamphetamine accompanied by a former student, Jesse Pinkman, with the aim of securing his family's financial future before he dies.

breaking_bad_season_0.name: Good Cop Bad Cop
breaking_bad_season_0.description: Hank and Marie try to spice up their relationship on Valentine's Day.

breaking_bad_season_0.name: Wedding Day
breaking_bad_season_0.description: Walt and Hank have a talk before Hank gets married.

breaking_bad_season_0.name: TwaughtHammer
breaking_bad_season_0.description: Jesse and Badger make a behind the scenes video about their band "TwaughtHammer" and show a music video for their song "Fallacies."

breaking_bad_season_0.name: The Break-In
breaking_bad_season_0.description: Walt and Badger attempt to retrieve a vacuum cleaner stuffed with drug money from an elderly woman's locked garage.

breaking_bad_season_0.name: Better Call Saul - Saul Better Help My Mom
Better Call Saul - Who Can You Sue
Letters to Saul - Did I Murder an Old Man
No Half Measures
breaking_bad_season_0.description: Documentary - Creating the Final Season of Breaking Bad.

breaking_bad_season_1.name: Pilot
breaking_bad_season_1.description: When an unassuming high school chemistry teacher discovers he has a rare form of lung cancer, he decides to team up with a former student and create a top of the line crystal meth in a used RV, to provide for his family once he is gone.

breaking_bad_season_1.name: Cat's in the Bag...
breaking_bad_season_1.description: Walt and Jesse attempt to tie up loose ends. The desperate situation gets more complicated with the flip of a coin. Walt's wife, Skyler, becomes suspicious of Walt's strange behavior.

breaking_bad_season_1.name: ...And the Bag's in the River
breaking_bad_season_1.description: Walter fights with Jesse over his drug use, causing him to leave Walter alone with their captive, Krazy-8. Meanwhile, Hank has a scared straight moment with Walter Jr. after his aunt discovers he has been smoking pot. Also, Skylar is upset when Walter stays away from home.

breaking_bad_season_1.name: Cancer Man
breaking_bad_season_1.description: Walter finally tells his family that he has been stricken with cancer. Meanwhile, the DEA believes Albuquerque has a new, big time player to worry about. Meanwhile, a worthy recipient is the target of a depressed Walter's anger, and Jesse makes a surprise visit to his parents home.

breaking_bad_season_1.name: Gray Matter
breaking_bad_season_1.description: Walter and Skyler attend a former colleague's party. Jesse tries to free himself from the drugs, while Skyler organizes an intervention.

breaking_bad_season_1.name: Crazy Handful of Nothin'
breaking_bad_season_1.description: The side effects of chemo begin to plague Walt. Meanwhile, the DEA rounds up suspected dealers.

breaking_bad_season_1.name: A No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal
breaking_bad_season_1.description: Walter accepts his new identity as a drug dealer after a PTA meeting. Elsewhere, Jesse decides to put his aunt's house on the market and Skyler is the recipient of a baby shower.

breaking_bad_season_2.name: Seven Thirty-Seven
breaking_bad_season_2.description: Walt and Jesse are vividly reminded of Tucoâ€™s volatile nature, and try to figure a way out of their business partnership. Hank attempts to mend fences between the estranged Marie and Skyler.

breaking_bad_season_2.name: Grilled
breaking_bad_season_2.description: Walt and Jesse find themselves in close quarters with an unhinged Tuco. Marie and Hank comfort Skyler, who is distraught over Waltâ€™s disappearance. Hank pays a visit to Mrs. Pinkman on some not-so-official business.

breaking_bad_season_2.name: Bit by a Dead Bee
breaking_bad_season_2.description: Walt and Jesse cover their tracks, but as a result, both of their financial situations suffer. Meanwhile, Hank and his DEA colleagues may have a break in their meth investigation.

breaking_bad_season_2.name: Down
breaking_bad_season_2.description: Walt tries to reconnect with his family. Still suspicious of her husband's actions, Skyler keeps her distance. Jesse finds himself without a place to live and struggles to cope.

breaking_bad_season_2.name: Breakage
breaking_bad_season_2.description: Tensions and bills mount at the White household. Hank makes progress at work, but struggles with some residual effects from his encounter with Tuco. Jesse takes charge and assembles a crew of dealers to get their product out on the streets.

breaking_bad_season_2.name: Peekaboo
breaking_bad_season_2.description: Walt returns to work. Skinny Pete gets ripped off and when Jesse steps in to "handle it," he gets more than he bargained for. Skyler finally gets to thank Gretchen for paying for Walt's treatment.

breaking_bad_season_2.name: Negro y Azul
breaking_bad_season_2.description: Rumors fly about Jesse's recent actions as he and Walt discuss expanding their business into new territories. Hank struggles to fit in with his new co-workers in El Paso. Skyler pursues a new job opportunity that reconnects her with a former colleague. Jesse gets to know his landlord, Jane.

breaking_bad_season_2.name: Better Call Saul
breaking_bad_season_2.description: When Badger finds himself in trouble with the law, Walt and Jesse seek the legal advice of a shady attorney, Saul Goodman. The DEA believe they may have finally caught up with the elusive 'Heisenberg.' Hank returns to Albuquerque, but his troubled mental state and demeanor cause Marie to worry.

breaking_bad_season_2.name: 4 Days Out
breaking_bad_season_2.description: After Walt undergoes a PET-CT scan, he and his family wait for news about his cancer treatment progress. Fearing the worst, Walt follows Saul's advice to cook as much product as he can with the time he has left. Jesse's relationship with Jane develops, but is put on hold when he and Walt retreat to the desert for their marathon cook.

breaking_bad_season_2.name: Over
breaking_bad_season_2.description: Walt and Hank get into a heated argument at a party the Whites host to thank friends and family for their support over the last few months. A stir-crazy Walt consumes himself with home improvements. Skyler is emotional and conflicted about Walt's treatment and opens up to her boss, Ted. Jane hides her relationship with Jesse from her father.

breaking_bad_season_2.name: Mandala
breaking_bad_season_2.description: When Walt and Jesse's crew of dealers begins to dwindle, Saul proposes a new business partner. Meanwhile, Skyler makes a disturbing discovery at work and confronts Ted. Jesse divulges his real profession to Jane, and their relationship takes a dangerous turn.

breaking_bad_season_2.name: Phoenix

orange_is_the_new_black.name: Orange Is the New Black
orange_is_the_new_black.description: Piper Chapman is a public relations executive with a career and a fiance when her past suddenly catches up to her. In her mid-30s she is sentenced to spend time in a minimum-security women's prison in Connecticut for her association with a drug runner 10 years earlier. This Netflix original series is based on the book of the same title. Forced to trade power suits for prison orange, Chapman makes her way through the corrections system and adjusts to life behind bars, making friends with the many eccentric, unusual and unexpected people she meets.

search_results.name: The Real Housewives of Orange County
search_results.description: Bravo brings you into the lives of five women and their families who live in one of the wealthiest communities in the country. They take the viewer "inside the gates" to show their lives aren't always perfect.

search_results.name: Orange (2016)
search_results.description:
One day, Naho Takamiya receives a letter written to herself from ten years in the future. As Naho reads on, the letter recites the exact events of the day, including the transfer of a new student into her class named Kakeru Naruse.

The Naho from ten years later repeatedly states that she has many regrets, and she wants to fix these by making sure the Naho from the past can make the right decisionsâ€”especially regarding Kakeru. What's more shocking is that she discovers that ten years later, Kakeru will no longer be with them. Future Naho asks her to watch over him closely.

search_results.name: Orange (2015)
search_results.description: Everyone has regrets in life. So who wouldn't take the chance to change the past if given the opportunity? When sixteen-year-old Takamiya Naho receives a mysterious letter, claiming to be from her twenty-seven-year-old self, her life is suddenly thrown into flux. The letter tells her that a new transfer student by the name of Naruse Kakeru will be joining her class, and to keep her eye on him. But why? Naho must decide what to make of the letter and its cryptic warning, and what it means not only for her future, but for Kakeru's as well.

search_results.name: Orange County Choppers
search_results.description: Follow the world's most renowned custom motorcycle manufacturer and its fearless leader, Paul Teutul Sr. with his team as they reach new extremes resulting in mind-blowing bikes and, of course, state-of-the-art drama.

search_results.name: Orange Days
search_results.description: Kai Yuuki (Satoshi Tsumabuki) is in his senior year at university studying social welfare psychology. At present, he is in the middle of job-hunting season. He is finding it difficult with no job offers so far. One day, he meets a girl who is playing violin in the campus. She is Sae Hagio (Kou Shibasaki). In marked contrast to her beautiful tone and attractive looks, her personality is somewhat impertinent. And to top it off, she communicates through very vulgar sign language. Four years ago, she lost the most important thing for a violinist - her hearing. As a result Sae closed off her inner self from the outside world. Kai finds himself on a date with Sae, in place of his best friend. Unexpectedly, he comes into contact with Sae's private side. Love, job-hunting, friendship... Setting a campus in spring as a dorama`s backdrop, it's the start of a glittering youth drama. --TBS

search_results.name: Orange Marmalade
search_results.description: Despite a 200-year-old treaty between humans and vampires, both races still don't get along. Amidst the looming tension, Jung Jae Min, a posh yet kindhearted high school student, quickly falls for the mysterious new girl Baek Ma Ri. But can Ma Ri conceal her true vampire identity and give love an honest chance? If these star-crossed lovers can find the courage to make the leap, Jae Min and Ma Ri may just be the key to a final resolution between humans and vampires...

search_results.name: Soldier of Orange
search_results.description:
Erik Lanshof is one of six carefree friends. When the Nazis invade Holland, however, the group is drawn inevitably into the conflict. 
Based on an autobiographical novel by Erik Hazelhoff Roelfzema, Soldaat van Oranje.

search_results.name: Newport Harbor: The Real Orange County
search_results.description: It's one of the wealthiest, most beautiful beachside communities in the world and MTV has unlimited access to the tight-knit power clique of eight rich, beautiful teenagers that live there. Their lives intertwine in ways you won't believe, until you drop in for a visit. Laguna Beach is paradise--a little slice of heaven on earth--why would anyone want to leave? The answer will come as you watch the best friends share experiences through parties, relationships, love and small town injustice. This is where the angst and the tumultuous affairs are the stuff of prime time drama, except this is all REAL. And that's just the tip of the iceberg. Welcome to paradise, otherwise known as Laguna Beach, California

search_results.name: The High Fructose Adventures of Annoying Orange
search_results.description: The show follows the lives of Orange and friends; Pear, Passion Fruit, Midget Apple, Marshmellow, Grandpa Lemon and the antagonistic Grapefruit. The main setting takes place at a grocery store named Daneboe's (a reference to creator Dane Boedigheimer) which is watched over by employee Nerville (played by internet personality Toby Turner). There is no one-track premise for the show but instead focuses on the surreal misadventures of the fruit as they face evil vegetables, alien broccoli and other weird characters as well.

search_results.name: Oranges Are Not The Only Fruit
search_results.description: Charlotte Coleman starred as Jess, a girl growing up in a Pentecostal evangelical household in Lancashire, England  in the 1970s, who comes to understand that she is a lesbian. The allegorical fairytales that are woven into the novel do not appear on the screen. Miss Jewsbury's love-making with the underage Jess, which appears in the novel, was also excluded. Even with these cuts the series caused controversy when shown due to the remaining lesbian sex scenes and its portrayal of the Elim Pentecostal faith.

search_results.name: The Annoying Orange
search_results.description: Orange resides on a fruit cart display in a kitchen with other objects such as his best friend, Pear, a Bartlett pear. Most episodes consist of Orange heckling other characters until they meet a sudden and gruesome end, usually by evisceration with a chef's knife (although the implements used to cut them up range from a blender to a toy pinwheel). Usually, Orange tries to "warn" them before it happens, blurting out the weapon-in-use, such as "Knife!".

search_results.name: Meet the Orangutans
search_results.description: Meet the Orangutans is a window into the extraordinary daily drama of the world's oldest Orangutan Sanctuary. From babies being bottle-fed and wearing nappies, to teenagers being taught how to climb trees, and wounded Orangutans arriving at the sanctuary needing urgent veterinary care, there is never a dull moment. The human carers, run by eccentric Brit Sue Sheward, are every bit as colourful too, and the jury's still out on who rules the roost - the staff or the apes.

search_results.name: ** DELETE ** DUPLICATE ofÂ The High Fructose Adventures of Annoying Orange
Kimagure Orange Road
search_results.description: Fifteen year old Kyosuke Kasuga moves to a new city and becomes enamoured by one Madoka Ayukawa, whom often treats him coldly even though she seemed friendly the first time they met, when he caught her red straw hat on the stairs. Kyosuke also must try to avoid breaking the heart of the slightly childish Hikaru Hiyama, whom fell in love with him after she saw him make an impossible shot with a basketball and whom likes to shower him with affection. Also, just to make things interesting, Kyosuke, his sisters, his grandfather, and his cousins all have various powers (teleportation, psychokinesis, hypnosis, time travel, personality transferrence) which Kyosuke desperately tries to keep a secret, though some of the other family members have no such qualms against using their powers in public.

search_results.name: Bernhard, Scoundrel of Orange
search_results.description:
Bernhard - Schavuit van Oranje is a four part series about more than just the turbulent life of the prince consort. An engaging drama about a man trying to escape a rigid life, finding his own path and surviving deep crises to find out what true love truely means.
The story takes us from Soestdijk to German Reckenwalde, Berlin, London, Argentina and Canada. It paints a portrait of the world of the thirties of the twentieth century to the beginning of the twenty-first century.

search_results.name: Orange
search_results.description: This sitcom revolves around the ambitions, passions and relationships of a group of young people who work as lifeguards at a water theme park. It also deals with issues of water safety.

search_results.name: Ripening Orange
search_results.description: Can infertility cause you to find your own replacement? Da Ma (Gui Ya Lei), known as Madam Rong, is infertile. Because she canâ€™t bear any children for her husband, Rong Yao Hua (Kou Shi Xun), he ignores Da Ma and spends all of his time with the beautiful Yan Hong (Jia Ni) at the brothel. Da Ma meets Xiu He (Zhou Xun), an innocent farmerâ€™s daughter, who reminds her of the way she looked when she was younger. Da Ma decides to take Xiu He in as a concubine for Yao Hua so that she can bear a child for him. But in an unexpected twist of fate, Yao Huaâ€™s cousin, Yao Hui (Huang Lei), stands in as the groom for Yao Hua on the wedding day. When Yao Hui then falls in love with Xiu He, what will happen to Da Maâ€™s plan?

search_results.name: Orangutan Diary
search_results.description:
Steve Leonard and Michaela Strachan are on a rescue mission to help save some of our closest animal relatives â€“ orangutans.

The Borneo Orangutan Survival Foundation's single aim is to ensure a wild future for endangered orangutans. More than 450 rescued animals have found a safe home at the Nyaru Menteng Centre in Borneo. Director and former air stewardess, Lone Droscher Nielson, has dedicated the last 13 years of her life to saving these great apes. She and her team work round the clock to care for and educate the orangutans. Their aim is to return as many animals as possible back to the wild.

search_results.name: Laguna Beach: The Real Orange County
Orange Roughies
search_results.description:
New Zealand crime drama series about a group of police and customs officers working to keep the country's borders secure.

The core cast includes Nicholas Coghlan as Detective Sergeant Danny Wilder, Zoe Naylor as Senior Customs Officer Jane Durant, Mark Ruka as Detective Constable Zack Wiki, Stephen Hall as Superintendent Ron Maddock, and Nick Klempton as Officer Noel Bullerton.

search_results.name: Poor Man's Orange
search_results.description: It is the early '50s and the Darcy family continues their struggle to build a better life despite the forces lined up against them in this sequel to the popular made-for-TV film Harp in the South. Father Hughie (Martyn_Sanderson); his wife, Mumma (Anne Plelan); and their younger daughter, Dolour (Kaarin_Fairfax), are broken people after Roie (Anna Hruby)the oldest daughter dies giving birth to a baby boy. Charlie(Shane Feeney-Connor), Roie's husband takes to the drink to forget his loss remembering only Roie and forgetting about his children. Dolour no longer a child fights for the strength to keep this family together in this hard bitten Irish-emigrate community of Surry Hills, but as bad times, illness, and romantic discord make their presence known, the Darcy's find that what they need most to survive is one another.

search_results.name: Poor Man's Orange
search_results.description: The Darcy family continues their struggle to build a new and better life in this sequel to the popular Harp in the South. It's the early '50s and the Darcys have managed to find a little home for themselves in Sydneyâ€™s Surry Hills where bad luck, illness, and romantic discord make their presence known. The Darcys find that what they need most to survive is one another.

search_results.name: Orange Bowl 2010
search_results.description:
In the coldest Orange Bowl ever, the Iowa Hawkeyes' swarming defense kept the heat on Georgia Tech.

No. 10 Iowa solved Tech's explosive triple option and Ricky Stanzi threw two early touchdown passes for a 24-14 victory Tuesday night.

Despite a temperature of 49 degrees at kickoff, the Hawkeyes had Tech sweating from the start. The ninth-ranked Yellow Jackets averaged 35 points during the regular season, but their only score in the first three quarters came on Jerrard Tarrant 's 40-yard interception return.

''This was Hawkeye weather,'' Iowa coach Kirk Ferentz said. ''We feel right at home right now.''

The Hawkeyes (11-2) earned their first Bowl Championship Series bowl win, matched the school record for victories and could claim their highest final ranking since finishing No. 3 in 1960.

Atlantic Coast Conference champion Georgia Tech (11-3) totaled nine first downs and 155 yards, both season lows.

''We haven't played many games like that,'' coach Paul Johnson said. ''We couldn't seem to get anything going. We couldn't hit a pass play, couldn't hit a big play.''

The Yellow Jackets were first in the nation in time of possession, second in rushing and 11th in scoring. But they sputtered against an Iowa defense that held four bowl-bound teams to 10 points or less during the regular season.

''If you say 'Hawkeye football,' it's defense,'' Stanzi said. ''That's all it is: defense.''

End Adrian Clayborn led Iowa's defensive charge. He had two sacks and nine tackles, including two for a loss, and was chosen the game's most valuable player.

search_results.name: Man In An Orange Shirt
search_results.description: A love story in two films charts the very different challenges to happiness for Michael and Thomas in the aftermath of World War 2, and to Adam and Steve in the present day.

search_results.name: Camp Orange
search_results.description:
Camp Orange is an Australian children's reality television show broadcast on Nickelodeon. The first season premiered in February 2005. The latest season, Camp Orange: Twisted Siblings, premiered on 27 June 2015.
The format has been adapted and produced for international markets, including Italy and more recently the UK. The later, which was filmed and produced in Australia, premiered on 22 July 2011 in the UK and Ireland.

search_results.name: Catatan Hati Seorang Istri
search_results.description: It is a story about women who each has had their heart broken. It is narrated by HANA (Dewi Sandra), a book writer who also becomes the lead character. She tells the stories of her best friends, VINA (Yasmin Wildblood) and ANISA (Intan Nuraini), who live in the same complex. Their conflict is strongly similar. It is of how a wife deals with problems with her husband. Hana lives with her husband BRAM (Ashraf Sinclair), and her daughter ROSI. They have a harmonious relationship. Thatâ€™s why many of her friends share their story with her. Hana can only advice them to be patience, and devoted. It is a wifeâ€™s duty to be the foundation of a relationship. At least itâ€™s what Hana says when one of her friends is thinking about getting a divorce. Hana keeps reminding her of a wifeâ€™s duty to remind her husband when he has done something wrong. Husband is the bridge that will lead a wife to heaven. Hanaâ€™s own life is tested when she encounter someone called â€œHello Kittyâ€ who has been sending intimate sms to her husband. Hana gets to think; Is it possible that her husband can betray her love?â€ Hana tries to remember if thereâ€™s anything different about Bramâ€™s behavior from they day they are married to today. Aside from that, Hanaâ€™s friends still shares their stories with her. Anisa, who is now living near her, often receives abuse from her husband. Hana feels sorry for Anisa and her son, DANTE. Meanwhile, Vina is more decisive. She has decided to get a divorce from her husband, HELMI (Baim Wong), and move on with her life, along with her daughter DINDA, and her mother.

orange_is_the_new_black_1.name: I Wasn't Ready
orange_is_the_new_black_1.description: Sentenced to fifteen months for a crime committed in her youth, Piper Chapman leaves her supportive fiance Larry for her new home: a women's prison.

orange_is_the_new_black_1.name: Tit Punch
orange_is_the_new_black_1.description: After insulting the food in front of the prison chef, Piper is starved out by the kitchen staff and struggles to offer up an acceptable apology.

orange_is_the_new_black_1.name: Lesbian Request Denied
orange_is_the_new_black_1.description: Targeted for romance by a fellow prisoner, Piper finds that subtlety is an ineffective approach to letting her suitor down.

orange_is_the_new_black_1.name: Imaginary Enemies
orange_is_the_new_black_1.description: Piper gets to know her stern new roommate; the prisoners prepare a farewell party for one of their own; a misplaced screwdriver has dire consequences.

orange_is_the_new_black_1.name: The Chickening
orange_is_the_new_black_1.description: When her sighting of a legendary feral chicken polarizes the inmates, Larry wonders if Piper is getting too absorbed in the "fishbowl" of prison life.

orange_is_the_new_black_1.name: WAC Pack
orange_is_the_new_black_1.description: The inmates campaign along racial lines for positions on a prisoners council, but Piper tries to stay above the increasingly raucous competition.

orange_is_the_new_black_1.name: Blood Donut
orange_is_the_new_black_1.description: Piper wants the prison's outdoor running track reopened, but in order to get it, she'll have to give her corrections officer something he wants.

orange_is_the_new_black_1.description: Red gets pressured to smuggle drugs through her kitchen; Larry publishes an article about Piper in the "New York Times;" two babies come into the world.

orange_is_the_new_black_2.description: Sophia gives the women a much-needed lesson in female anatomy; Morello takes a detour; Larry makes some life changes.

orange_is_the_new_black_2.name: Low Self Esteem City
orange_is_the_new_black_2.description: A bathroom turf war sees deeper lines drawn in the sand as Gloria and Vee go head to head. Piper receives devastating news.

orange_is_the_new_black_2.name: You Also Have a Pizza
orange_is_the_new_black_2.description: Love is in the air as the inmates prepare for a Valentine's Day party; Red makes an intriguing new discovery. Larry asks Piper to be his prison mole.

orange_is_the_new_black_2.name: Comic Sans
orange_is_the_new_black_2.description: Piper starts a prison newsletter with the help of Healy and a few other inmates; Vee launches an entrepreneurial enterprise.

orange_is_the_new_black_2.name: Appropriately Sized Pots
orange_is_the_new_black_2.description: Piper faces a new backlash over special privileges; Caputo feels pressure to toughen up, resulting in administrative changes.

orange_is_the_new_black_2.name: 40 Oz. of Furlough
orange_is_the_new_black_2.description: Piper's relationship with Larry faces a real-world test; Red's effort to redeem herself is finally rewarded. A familiar figure returns to Litchfield.

orange_is_the_new_black_2.name: Little Mustachioed Shit
orange_is_the_new_black_2.description: The guards get tougher in a bid to turn up prison contraband; a big, lingering secret is finally revealed.

orange_is_the_new_black_2.name: Take a Break from Your Values
orange_is_the_new_black_2.description: Piper is shocked at an unexpected change in her status; Soso's hunger strike attracts new support that takes on a religious fervor.

orange_is_the_new_black_2.name: It Was the Change
orange_is_the_new_black_2.description: Tensions run high as a prison power outage forces several issues to come to light. Piper finds herself compromised and is forced to think on her feet.

orange_is_the_new_black_2.name: We Have Manners. We're Polite.
orange_is_the_new_black_2.description: Several futures hang in the balance as the inmates face and confront their worst nightmares: Life will never be the same again.

orange_is_the_new_black_3.name: Mother's Day
orange_is_the_new_black_3.description: Caputo's kinder, gentler new regime includes organizing a Mother's Day fair for the inmates that brings up a LOT of mixed feelings about family.

orange_is_the_new_black_3.name: Bed Bugs and Beyond
orange_is_the_new_black_3.description: Tempers flare when bed bugs invade. Alex cracks. Red lashes out at Piper. Aleida interferes with Daya and Bennett. Caputo gets bad news.

orange_is_the_new_black_3.name: Empathy Is a Boner Killer
orange_is_the_new_black_3.description: Nicky's stash situation gets complicated. Alex and Crazy Eyes try a new drama class. Red assists Healy with a personal matter.

orange_is_the_new_black_3.name: Finger in the Dyke
orange_is_the_new_black_3.description: Big Boo comes up with a scheme to make money. Daya, Taystee and Crazy Eyes confront reality. Caputo tries to make a good impression on some visitors.

orange_is_the_new_black_3.name: Fake It Till You Fake It Some More
orange_is_the_new_black_3.description: Rumors fly among the inmates about a new, higher-paying job assignment, especially when they have to take a test for it

orange_is_the_new_black_3.name: Ching Chong Chang
orange_is_the_new_black_3.description: Regime change isn't going over well with the staff, but Red makes it work for her. Lorna finds a way to meet men. Chang shows her private side.

orange_is_the_new_black_3.name: Tongue-Tied
orange_is_the_new_black_3.description: Normaâ€™s healing powers draw more believers. Piper creates a new business venture. Caputo breaks in the new hires.

orange_is_the_new_black_3.name: Fear, and Other Smells
orange_is_the_new_black_3.description: Piper gets creative in order to grow her business. Crazy Eyesâ€™s sci-fi sex story for drama class is a hit. Alex doesnâ€™t trust new inmate Lolly.

orange_is_the_new_black_3.name: Where My Dreidel At
orange_is_the_new_black_3.description: Too many inmates seem to be getting religion, so a rabbi comes to visit. Leanne tries to organize Norma's followers.

orange_is_the_new_black_3.name: A Tittin' and a Hairin'
orange_is_the_new_black_3.description: Pennsatucky, Piper, Crazy Eyes and Lorna get closer with their new admirers. Tensions between Sophia and Gloria, and Alex and Lolly escalate.

orange_is_the_new_black_3.name: We Can Be Heroes
orange_is_the_new_black_3.description: Caputo and Piper confront labor issues. A miracle occurs in Norma's group. Crazy Eyes's erotica winds up in the hands of the staff.

orange_is_the_new_black_3.name: Donâ€™t Make Me Come Back There
orange_is_the_new_black_3.description: Daya goes into labor. Sophia suffers a hate crime. Stella helps Piper with a business snag. Taystee takes on a new role.

orange_is_the_new_black_3.name: Trust No Bitch
orange_is_the_new_black_3.description: Miracles and conversions occur, but Piper and Caputo know that some situations can't be dealt with through spiritual means.

orange_is_the_new_black_4.name: Work That Body for Me
orange_is_the_new_black_4.description: With a major security breach and a lot of new inmates, Caputo has to call in the big guns. Things get a little too real for Crazy Eyes and Lolly.

orange_is_the_new_black_4.name: Power Suit
orange_is_the_new_black_4.description: The newcomers stir up ethnic and domestic conflicts, but Maria sees an opportunity. Judy's special treatment raises eyebrows.

orange_is_the_new_black_4.name: (Don't) Say Anything
orange_is_the_new_black_4.description: A new job puts Taystee close to Caputo. Lorna has to get creative in her marriage. Soso and Poussey deal with some awkward truths.

orange_is_the_new_black_4.name: Doctor Psycho
orange_is_the_new_black_4.description: Nothing stays hidden for long when emotions run high, but Red, Healy and Caputo try to keep the peace. Piper has a business competitor.

orange_is_the_new_black_4.name: We'll Always Have Baltimore
orange_is_the_new_black_4.description: Company policies lead to a shortage of critical supplies and an eventful trip to a prison convention. Piscatella starts a new anti-gang initiative.

orange_is_the_new_black_4.name: Piece of Sh*t
orange_is_the_new_black_4.description: Piper's plan to edge out the competition could backfire badly. Cindy finds a way to make Taystee's job pay off. Luschek gets some interesting mail.

orange_is_the_new_black_4.name: It Sounded Nicer in My Head
orange_is_the_new_black_4.description: Paranoia strikes deep for Lolly and Judy, aggravating an already tense situation. Red sticks to a Russian tradition for an important occasion.

orange_is_the_new_black_4.name: Friends in Low Places
orange_is_the_new_black_4.description: A new work detail doesn't go over well with the inmates. Judy seeks help from Poussey. Maria finds a place she can conduct business.

orange_is_the_new_black_4.name: Turn Table Turn
orange_is_the_new_black_4.description: Ramos and Flores figure out ways to rebel against authority. A news item has an unexpected effect. Red and Lorna face personal disappointment.

orange_is_the_new_black_4.name: Bunny, Skull, Bunny, Skull
orange_is_the_new_black_4.description: The movie night selection becomes controversial. Aleida makes an adjustment. Piper worries the prison punishments are getting medieval.

orange_is_the_new_black_4.name: People Persons
orange_is_the_new_black_4.description: Caputo's leadership is challenged and the inmates are in for a long night of lockdown after workers make an unsettling discovery.

orange_is_the_new_black_4.name: The Animals
orange_is_the_new_black_4.description: Alliances shift among the prison "families" as Piscatella and his guards crack down. Poussey, Judy and Alex prefer to look ahead to the future.

orange_is_the_new_black_4.name: Toast Can't Never Be Bread Again
orange_is_the_new_black_4.description: Corporate bureaucracy and simmering anger work against Caputo's efforts to keep a sensitive situation under control.

american_horror_story.name: American Horror Story
american_horror_story.description: An anthology series that centers on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show, an enigmatic hotel and a sinister farmhouse in Roanoke, North Carolina.

american_horror_story_season_1.name: Pilot
american_horror_story_season_1.description: A therapist and his family move across the country to escape their troubled past, but quickly discover that their new home comes with its own horrific baggage.

american_horror_story_season_1.name: Home Invasion
american_horror_story_season_1.description: Vivien and Violet get themselves caught in a dangerous situation. Meanwhile, Ben goes back to Boston to fix a mistake that he made.

american_horror_story_season_1.name: Murder House
american_horror_story_season_1.description: Vivien learns the horrific truth about the house's first residents and Ben's visitor causes him to further unravel about what really happened in the haunted house. Constance and Moira have their history revealed.

american_horror_story_season_1.name: Halloween (1)
american_horror_story_season_1.description: The line between the living and the dead blurs on Halloween. Two of the house's previous residents give the Harmons decorating advice.

american_horror_story_season_1.name: Halloween (2)
american_horror_story_season_1.description: Tate comes face to face with his past, and Ben and Vivien are haunted by a new houseguest before Halloween night comes to an end.

american_horror_story_season_1.name: Piggy, Piggy
american_horror_story_season_1.description: Constance enlists Violet's assistance with Tate. Ben helps a new patient confront his fears.

american_horror_story_season_1.name: Open House
american_horror_story_season_1.description: Moira persuades a buyer to make an offer, while Constance and Larry work against her efforts.

american_horror_story_season_1.name: Rubber Man
american_horror_story_season_1.description: The man in the rubber suit is revealed.

american_horror_story_season_1.name: Spooky Little Girl
american_horror_story_season_1.description: One of history's most famous murder victims pays the house a visit. Constance discovers more of Tate's bad behavior.

american_horror_story_season_1.name: Smoldering Children
american_horror_story_season_1.description: Violet learns about the rules of the house. The truth about Larry's condition is explained. Constance is interrogated by the police.

american_horror_story_season_1.name: Birth
american_horror_story_season_1.description: Vivien gives birth. Tate and Violet attempt to rid the house of some of its ghosts for good.

american_horror_story_season_1.name: Afterbirth
american_horror_story_season_1.description: In the aftermath of family tragedy, Ben tries to take his child out of the Murder House. Meanwhile, Violet and Vivien accustom themselves to their new living arrangements, Constance raises Tate's child as her own and a new family buys the house.

american_horror_story_season_2.name: Welcome to Briarcliff
american_horror_story_season_2.description: Terrifying evils blur the boundaries between reality and insanity at the Briarcliff Manor.

american_horror_story_season_2.name: Tricks and Treats
american_horror_story_season_2.description: An exorcist is called to Briarcliff to help save a troubled farm boy; Sister Jude's darkest secret is revealed.

american_horror_story_season_2.name: Nor'easter
american_horror_story_season_2.description: A violent storm allows a group of patients to plan a daring escape; Sister Jude is haunted by her past.

american_horror_story_season_2.name: I Am Anne Frank (1)
american_horror_story_season_2.description: A new patient exposes Arden's past; Kit learns why Grace was admitted to Briarcliff.

american_horror_story_season_2.name: I Am Anne Frank (2)
american_horror_story_season_2.description: Sister Jude employs a renowned Nazi hunter to gather evidence against Arden; Kit makes a surprising confession; Bloody Face is unmasked.

american_horror_story_season_2.name: The Origins of Monstrosity
american_horror_story_season_2.description: A mysterious little girl is abandoned at Briarcliff; the Monsignor makes a Faustian pact with Dr. Arden; the origin of Bloody Face is revealed.

american_horror_story_season_2.name: Dark Cousin
american_horror_story_season_2.description: Sister Mary Eunice is terrified to discover a dark angel at Briarcliff; Kit makes a bold move to be reunited with Grace.

american_horror_story_season_2.name: Unholy Night
american_horror_story_season_2.description: A murderous Santa wreaks havoc on Briarcliff; Sister Jude faces off with the devil; Arden has a shocking encounter in the death chute.

american_horror_story_season_2.name: The Coat Hanger
american_horror_story_season_2.description: The Monsignor takes an unlikely convert under his wing; Lana secures a new piece of evidence that can exonerate Kit; Dr. Arden witnesses a miraculous return.

american_horror_story_season_2.name: The Name Game
american_horror_story_season_2.description: The Monsignor confronts the Devil; Dr. Ardenâ€™s experiments reach a shocking conclusion; Dr. Thredson facilitates a surprising reunion for Kit.

american_horror_story_season_2.name: Spilt Milk
american_horror_story_season_2.description: Grace tells Kit devastating news about Alma; Dr. Thredson receives an unexpected visitor; the Monsignor goes to extreme lengths to silence Jude.

american_horror_story_season_2.name: Continuum
american_horror_story_season_2.description: A deadly new inmate threatens Sister Jude's chance of release; Grace's obsession with the aliens turns violent.

american_horror_story_season_2.name: Madness Ends
american_horror_story_season_2.description: Johnny sets out to complete his father's work; Lana leads the charge to finally shut down Briarcliff.

american_horror_story_season_3.name: Bitchcraft
american_horror_story_season_3.description: A young girl discovers she possesses a strange genetic affliction tracing back to the dark days of Salem; Fiona Goode returns to town.

american_horror_story_season_3.name: Boy Parts
american_horror_story_season_3.description: Fiona helps Zoe and Madison deal with a horrible tragedy; Delphine LaLaurie struggles to adjust to modern life; Cordelia faces a dark decision about her family.

american_horror_story_season_3.name: The Replacements
american_horror_story_season_3.description: Fiona takes on an unlikely protÃ©gÃ©; a guilt-ridden Zoe tries to give Kyle his old life back; Madison has a fiery exchange with Joan Ramsey.

american_horror_story_season_3.name: Fearful Pranks Ensue
american_horror_story_season_3.description: Fiona's choices rattle a decades-long truce between the Salem witches and Marie Laveau; the Council of Witchcraft pays a surprise visit to the academy with disturbing allegations.

american_horror_story_season_3.name: Burn, Witch. Burn!
american_horror_story_season_3.description: Besieged by Marie Laveau's army, Zoe unleashes a new power; Fiona and Myrtle clash over control of the coven; Madame LaLaurie is confronted by old ghosts.

american_horror_story_season_3.name: The Axeman Cometh
american_horror_story_season_3.description: Zoe, Queenie and Nan make contact with a dark spirit trapped in the academy; Cordelia's new power brings on a heartbreaking revelation.

american_horror_story_season_3.name: The Dead
american_horror_story_season_3.description: Fiona finds purpose in a dangerous love affair; Queenie questions her place in the Coven; Cordelia makes a decision about her mother.

american_horror_story_season_3.name: The Sacred Taking
american_horror_story_season_3.description: Cordelia rallies the girls in the fight to stop Fiona; a dangerous new enemy puts Misty in the cross hairs; the rivalry between Marie Laveau and Delphine comes to a head.

american_horror_story_season_3.name: Head
american_horror_story_season_3.description: Cordeliaâ€™s attacker is revealed. Fiona looks to form an alliance with Marie Laveau. Nan learns a disturbing truth about Lukeâ€™s past.

american_horror_story_season_3.name: The Magical Delights of Stevie Nicks
american_horror_story_season_3.description: Fiona attempts to out the new supreme with a visit from Stevie Nicks; Cordelia learns the truth about Hank and the witch hunters; Madison tries to eliminate her competition for the supremacy.

american_horror_story_season_3.name: Protect the Coven
american_horror_story_season_3.description: Fiona and Laveau have a deadly face off with The Corporation; Cordelia makes a desperate sacrifice.

american_horror_story_season_3.name: Go to Hell
american_horror_story_season_3.description: Cordelia's latest vision puts the coven's future in question; the girls manifest powerful new gifts; Queenie's search for Marie Laveau leads her to hell and back.

american_horror_story_season_4.name: Monsters Among Us
american_horror_story_season_4.description: One of the only surviving sideshows in the country struggles to stay in business during the dawning era of television; police make a terrifying discovery at a local farmhouse.

american_horror_story_season_4.name: Massacres and Matinees
american_horror_story_season_4.description: A citywide curfew threatens to shut down the freak show; a strongman from Ethel's troubled past arrives at camp; Gloria arranges a terrifying play date for Dandy; the Tattler Twins reveal a talent that could knock Elsa from the spotlight.

american_horror_story_season_4.name: Edward Mordrake, Pt. 1
american_horror_story_season_4.description: The freaks refuse to perform on Halloween due to an old carny superstition; Jimmy is smitten by a woman claiming to be a fortuneteller; Ethel receives life-changing news.

american_horror_story_season_4.name: Edward Mordrake, Pt. 2
american_horror_story_season_4.description: Edward Mordrake continues his search for a Freak to add to his ghostly coterie; Elsa tells the grisly story of her days in Germany; Jimmy and Maggie have a run-in with the Twisted Clown.

american_horror_story_season_4.name: Pink Cupcakes
american_horror_story_season_4.description: Stanley and Maggie hatch a plan to murder the Freaks; Gloria hides the evidence of Dandy's gruesome new hobby; a health scare reveals Desiree may not be the oddity she once thought.

american_horror_story_season_4.name: Bullseye
american_horror_story_season_4.description: Elsa unveils a dangerous new act; Stanley puts pressure on Maggie to murder Jimmy; Paul indulges in a secret romance.

american_horror_story_season_4.name: Test of Strength
american_horror_story_season_4.description: The women of the Freak Show rally against Dell after his latest act of violence; a strange encounter with Dandy raises Jimmyâ€™s suspicion about the clown murders.

american_horror_story_season_4.name: Blood Bath
american_horror_story_season_4.description: Recent disappearances around camp raise Ethelâ€™s suspicion of Elsa; Gloria makes a last ditch effort to contain Dandyâ€™s bloodlust.

american_horror_story_season_4.name: Tupperware Party Massacre
american_horror_story_season_4.description: In the wake of a tragic loss, Jimmy sinks into a drunken despair; a reading from Maggie spurs Dandy to action; Stanley and Elsa track down the Twins.

american_horror_story_season_4.name: Orphans
american_horror_story_season_4.description: The death of a Freak sparks troubling behavior in Pepper; Elsa reveals the history of the Freak Show; Desiree grows suspicious of Maggie.

american_horror_story_season_4.name: Magical Thinking
american_horror_story_season_4.description: Elsa prepares for her move to Hollywood; the Twins grow enamored with a traveling salesman; Dell plots Jimmyâ€™s escape from police custody.

american_horror_story_season_4.name: Show Stoppers
american_horror_story_season_4.description: Maggie tries to prove her loyalty to Jimmy; Meanwhile, the Twins receive troubling information about Chester.

american_horror_story_season_4.name: Curtain Call
american_horror_story_season_4.description: The Freaks rebel against new management; Dandy prepares for his debut performance; Elsa arrives in Tinseltown.

american_horror_story_season_5.name: Checking In
american_horror_story_season_5.description: Detective and family man John Lowe investigates a chain of gruesome murders in Los Angeles. A mysterious tip points him to the enigmatic Hotel Cortez.

american_horror_story_season_5.name: Chutes and Ladders
american_horror_story_season_5.description: Fashion mogul Will Drake brings couture to the Hotel Cortez. A model catches The Countess' eye. John learns about the hotel's sadistic first owner.

american_horror_story_season_5.name: Mommy
american_horror_story_season_5.description: Alex is pushed to her breaking point after Scarlett stirs up memories of Holden. Donovan is targeted by a dangerous rival of The Countess.

american_horror_story_season_5.name: Devil's Night
american_horror_story_season_5.description: John receives an invitation to attend an exclusive Devil's Night soirÃ©e. Alex tries to diagnose Holden's strange condition.

american_horror_story_season_5.name: Room Service
american_horror_story_season_5.description: Alex uses an unconventional treatment to save a dying patient. A Halloween-hating couple tests Irisâ€™s limits.

american_horror_story_season_5.name: Room 33
american_horror_story_season_5.description: Ramona and Donovan enact their plan for revenge. Liz Taylor finds true love. The resident of Room 33 is revealed.

american_horror_story_season_5.name: Flicker
american_horror_story_season_5.description: Will Drakeâ€™s renovations uncover one of the Hotelâ€™s greatest secrets. John undergoes psychiatric evaluation. The Countess learns the fate of her first love.

american_horror_story_season_5.name: The Ten Commandments Killer
american_horror_story_season_5.description: John closes in on The Ten Commandments Killer. Sallyâ€™s arrangement with March is revealed.

american_horror_story_season_5.name: She Wants Revenge
american_horror_story_season_5.description: The Countess is reunited with her one true love. Donovan and Ramona take another stab at revenge. A careless decision lands Alex in hot water.

american_horror_story_season_5.name: She Gets Revenge
american_horror_story_season_5.description: Alex enlists John's help to contain an outbreak. Donovan learns the Countess' true intentions. Liz and Iris plan to leave the hotel for good.

american_horror_story_season_5.name: Battle Royale
american_horror_story_season_5.description: Ramona draws vitality from an unlikely source. Sally uses her past to negotiate her future. Scarlett learns the truth of her familyâ€™s affliction.

american_horror_story_season_5.name: Be Our Guest
american_horror_story_season_5.description: Iris and Liz oversee a new era at the Cortez. John and Alex struggle to adapt to life outside the hotel.

american_horror_story_season_6.name: Chapter 1
american_horror_story_season_6.description: Matt and Shelby, an interracial couple, decide to move to North Carolina and get away from the big city for peace and quiet and to start a new life, until Shelby starts seeing strange things that haunt her day and night.

american_horror_story_season_6.name: Chapter 2
american_horror_story_season_6.description: Matt and Shelby find a revealing videotape in a hidden cellar. Meanwhile, Lee's daughter Flora makes a new friend, and the mysterious events continue.

american_horror_story_season_6.name: Chapter 3
american_horror_story_season_6.description: Nightmares become an inescapable reality as unique stories of people's lives in America reveal the astonishing power of the supernatural.

american_horror_story_season_6.name: Chapter 4
american_horror_story_season_6.description: Scathach presents herself for the first time and reveals what she wants. However, Tomasyn and the ghost settlers have other plans.

american_horror_story_season_6.name: Chapter 5
american_horror_story_season_6.description: The Millers attempt to escape the house with the help of an unexpected ally.

american_horror_story_season_6.name: Chapter 6
american_horror_story_season_6.description: The producer of My Roanoke Nightmare decides to follow up his huge hit with a second season... putting the actors and their real-life counterparts in the same house during the Blood Moon, and seeing if Lee confesses to Mason's murder.

american_horror_story_season_6.name: Chapter 7
american_horror_story_season_6.description: Chaos breaks out at the house as Audrey, Monet, and Lee try to escape through the secret tunnel. Meanwhile, Shelby learns why Matt came back to the house, and Agnes considers a career change.

american_horror_story_season_6.name: Chapter 8
american_horror_story_season_6.description: Lee, Audrey, and Monet try to escape the Polks. Meanwhile, Shelby and Dominic are trapped by the ghosts in the house.

american_horror_story_season_6.name: Chapter 9
american_horror_story_season_6.description: Three My Roanoke Nightmare fans pay a visit to the House, unaware that they've arrived at the worst possible time. Meanwhile, Lee and Audrey try to recover the camera, and a new visitor doesn't prove very helpful.

american_horror_story_season_6.name: Chapter 10
american_horror_story_season_6.description: Season finale.  Lana Winters is interviewing Lee Harris about what happened during the Return to Roanoke.

episodesperdate_day1.name: King Shark vs. Gorilla Grodd
episodesperdate_day1.description: When Gorilla Grodd attacks Central City, Barry and Team Flash find themselves teaming up with an unexpected ally to defeat - King Shark. However, when they hit a snag, they bring in Dr. Tanya Lamden to try to reach the man behind the shark, Shay Lamden.

episodesperdate_day3.description: When Gorilla Grodd attacks Central City, Barry and Team Flash find themselves teaming up with an unexpected ally to defeat - King Shark. However, when they hit a snag, they bring in Dr. Tanya Lamden to try to reach the man behind the shark, Shay Lamden.
